<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;RT audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o denorm.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments> ; slightly simplified example from Istvan Varga 2006 sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
garvb init 0
instr 1
a1 oscils 0.6, 440, 0 a2 linsegr 0, 0.005, 1, 3600, 1, 0.08, 0 a1 = a1 * a2 vincr garvb, a1 outs a1, a1 endin
instr 99 ;"Always on"
denorm garvb aL, aR reverbsc garvb * 0.5, garvb * 0.5, 0.92, 10000 clear garvb outs aL, aR endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i 99 0 -1 ;held by a negative p3, means "always on" i 1 0 0.5 i 1 4 0.5 e 8 ;8 extra seconds after the performance
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
